MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task DrainAsync (this System.IO.Stream stream, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task DrainAsync(class System.IO.Stream stream, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function DrainAsync (stream As Stream, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task
static member DrainAsync : System.IO.Stream * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.param: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
Docs.summary:
Reads the specified to the end.
This API is effective when used in conjunction with buffering. It allows a buffered request stream to be synchronously read after it has been completely drained.
